name: Rishab Kanwal
tagline: Why did the programmer quit his job? Because he didn't get arrays.
body:
# Who am I?
I am a junior studying Computer Science at the University of Colorado, Boulder.

# Education
### University of Colorado Boulder – BS Computer Science

August 2014 - May 2017 (Expected)

GPA: 3.3, Major GPA: 4.0, Completed Credit Hours (With Transfer Credits): 94.8

Current Computer Science Coursework: Algorithms, Computer Systems, Principles of Programming Languages, Software Development Methods and Tools.
### Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies (India) – BBA Business Administration
July 2013 - April 2014 (Transferred out)

GPA: 3.2

# Experience
Mobile Application & UI Developer, BindassParty.com

Mumbai, India May 2015 - Present

* Designed and developed manager side mobile applications for Android and iOS with a local SQLite database to cache data for offline viewing. 
* Designed and developed a consumer side mock-up for the client side mobile application on Android.
* Redesigned the website UI to make content flow more intuitive as well as visual enhancements to make the website design more consistent and emphasize brand colors.

# Skills
### Operating Systems:
Linux, Mac OSX, Windows.
### Development Platforms and Programming Languages:
* Proficient in Android Development, C++, iOS Development, Java, JSON, Python, Swift.
* Some knowledge of C, Scala, SQL.
* Basic knowledge of Bash Shell Scripts, NodeJS, Objective C, RegEx, x86 Assembly.
### Software and IDE Tools:
Android Studio, Latex, Mathematica, XCode. 
### Other:
Business Development, Marketing, User Interface/User Experience Design.
